subsection.name: Introduction
subsection.p: This plugin stores identities. An identity is composed of attributes. Each attribute can be read, written or certified by the application calling the service.

subsection.name: REST API
subsection.p:
The plugin provides a REST API to manage identities. Several versions of the API can be called:
Version 2 : the URL to use is /identity/rest/identitystore/v2/identity. This version uses the objects of the packages fr.paris.lutece.plugins.identitystore.v2.* of the library-identitystore.
Version 3 : the URL to use is /identity/rest/identitystore/v3/identity. This version uses the objects of the packages fr.paris.lutece.plugins.identitystore.v3.* of the library-identitystore.
Version 2 can be used only for getting an Identity by its CUID or GUID. Only version 3 offers full API usage (CRUD & research).

subsection.name: Usage
subsection.p: The plugins exposes web methods to manage identities. Check /jsp/site/Portal.jsp?page=swaggerui page for more details about these methods.

subsection.name: Deletion of the identity
subsection.p: The deletion of an identity from the web service does not really delete it but flags it as 'deleted'. The attributes are deleted. Updating or retrieving an identity flagged 'deleted ' from the web service generates an exception.
Deleting an identity from the GUI completely deletes the identity from the BDD.
